column5: Hi guys. I am planning a trip out to Sparrow Lake tomorrow with my son. We have a boat and need to launch it preferably in the south end of the lake. Does anybody know a reasonable launch. (I have a 17.5ft boat ). I have used Lauderdales in the past but I find the $20.00 a bit steep.  Thanks in advance. Hope to post some pics when I get back.

Sparrow/Lauderdale is 15 bucks, but there is a tourney on there this weekend.Might want to pick another lake.Just a heads up.  Might I suggest Couch.You can launch for free and still some great fishing to be had.

Thanks for the heads up. I have been caught like that before. Show up early and find the area full of boats looking to launch for a tourny. I may opt to try somewhere else. Lots of good lakes around.  What tournament is it?
Mega bass I believe.  Just notice you joined up on my B-DAY.
Just call Lauderdales and they tell me that the tournament is on Sunday. Looks like we are good to go tomorrow.
Have a great time and besure to post you day.
Just a thought, if the tourney is Sunday, what percentage of the tournament anglers will be pre-fishing on Saturday?

Well I just got back from prefishing the pool and the tourney is a week away and there were 20 or so boats there. Sparrow will have a few guys there today.  Oh,todays prefish was HOT.Now if I can get on them next weekend.LOL
